description: React component for the Dashboard page in a mechanic request management app, displaying available requests and allowing mechanics to accept them.

methods.name: statusBadge
methods.description: Returns a span element with a class and label based on request status.

methods.name: renderVehicleCell
methods.description: Generates a vehicle label from make and model, or a placeholder if missing.

methods.name: DashboardPage
methods.description: Main React component for displaying and accepting mechanic requests.
